name: Elohan Chronicles: The Quest for Immortality
name_original: Elohan Chronicles: The Quest for Immortality
description:
This is still a prototype. You build a story not only with npcs, but with objects.

Controls are Arrows, Enter and Escape.

The ending loops back to the same room you started in, don't worry, it's supposed to, just no new content for it yet.

Have updated the art and mechanics some after that gif for a cover was made.

The game takes place on Elohan in the M'rak continent, during the end of the First Age and beginning of the Second Age. The lands are free to travel for now thanks to a peace accord, and some have heard of a secret order that promises to teach the divine means to immortality and ascension as a god.
